#comment: The following are CMOR internal settings and should not be edited by the user
_history_template: %s; CMOR rewrote data to be consistent with <activity_id>, and <Conventions> standards
comment: Requested citation: CMAP is provided by the NOAA PSL, Boulder, CO, USA at https://psl.noaa.gov
references: Xie, P., and P.A. Arkin, 1997: Global precipitation: A 17-year monthly analysis based on gauge observations, satellite estimates, and numerical model outputs. Bull. Amer. Meteor. Soc., 78, 2539 - 2558
title: CPC Merged Analysis of Precipitation prepared for PMPObs (ODS-v2.1.0)
